name: A Hotels City
description: Situated in the vibrant Vesterbro district in Copenhagen, Hotel Viktoria offers rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Tycho Brahe Planetarium is 300 metres away. Rooms have a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. The reception is open 24 hours for guests’ convenience. Restaurants, bars and cafes are within walking distance. The Meatpacking District is just a 5-minute walk away from Hotel Viktoria, while Copenhagen Central Station is 500 metres away. Tivoli Gardens is a 7-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Generator Copenhagen
description: Situated 150 metres from Kongens Nytorv Square, Generator Copenhagen offers budget accommodation, a late-night bar and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Kongens Nytorv Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away. Each room at Generator features modern decor and a mirror. The private rooms have a TV with Chromecast channels. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. Bed linen are included in all rooms. Generator Bar serves drinks, and has a chill-out lounge with TV and a pool table. DJ nights, karaoke and other events are arranged regularly. The hostel offers a convenient 24-hour reception. Laundry facilities and luggage storage is available on site. This hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of Strøget pedestrian street. The vibrant Nyhavn waterfront district is 1 km away.

name: Danhostel Copenhagen City & Apartments
address: H.C. Andersens Boulevard 50, 1553 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: This simple yet stylish hostel is in the heart of Copenhagen, within 10 minutes’ walk from attractions such as the Tivoli Gardens and the Strøget shopping street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Danhostel Copenhagen City & Apartments offers both private and dormitory rooms with wonderful views of Copenhagen's city centre. Bed linen and a towel will be provided during check-in. The rooms feature furniture by the renowned Danish designer Gubi. On-site facilities include a popular bar, TV areas, children's playroom, laundry room and a guest kitchen.

name: Absalon Hotel
description: This family-run hotel is in the vibrant Vesterbro district, within 5 minutes’ walk of Copenhagen Central Station and Tivoli Gardens. It offers bicycle rentals and a popular Scandinavian breakfast buffet. Featuring colourful décor by Designers Guild, Absalon’s modern rooms feature a desk and flat-screen TV with cable channels. A fridge and safety deposit box are also included. Danish pastries, gluten-free bread and tasty marmalade are just some of the breakfast options offered. Guests can enjoy afternoon coffee or a refreshing drink in the lobby or the hotel courtyard. Close to the popular Kødbyen neighbourhood (Meatpacking District), there are plenty of trendy bars and restaurants nearby, which staff will happily recommend.

name: Hotel Nora Copenhagen
description: Set a 12-minute walk from Nørreport Metro and Train Station, this hotel offers brightly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi and tea/coffee facilities. Købmagergade shopping street is a 12-minute walk away. A flat-screen TV, fridge and work desk are featured in all rooms at Hotel Nora Copenhagen. Each room has a tiled bathroom with shower. A free beer and a water bottle is available in the room on arrival. Breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Snacks and drinks can be bought from vending machines in Hotel Nora’s lobby. Private parking is possible in the hotel’s courtyard. Danish and international newspapers are found in the lobby. Copenhagen Botanical Garden is an 8-minute walk away. The National Gallery of Denmark is 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Copenhagen Go Hotel
description: Just 200 metres from Tårnby Station and 3 minutes’ drive from Copenhagen Airport, this hotel offers functional accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Central Copenhagen is a 10-minute drive away. Go Copenhagen’s modern guest rooms feature a TV, a work desk and a private bathroom with shower. A breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s dining room. Guests can relax and mingle in the bar. Hotel Go Copenhagen is 1 train stop from Field’s Shopping Centre.

name: a&o Copenhagen Norrebro
description: Located in Copenhagen, A&O Copenhagen Norrebro is a short drive from Tivoli Gardens and offers private parking on site. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of complimentary Wi-Fi during their stay. Practical amenities provided by the hotel include a communal kitchen and a laundry. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend sights to visit and provide other tourist information. A&O Copenhagen Norrebro has 168 rooms offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Bispebjerg Railway Station, which is within a five-minute walk of the hotel. Those staying at A&O Copenhagen Norrebro can relax at the on-site bar, conveniently located for a drink. For those with day trips planned, the hotel offers packed lunches if required. A&O Copenhagen Norrebro is close to Norrebro Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Copenhagen and its surrounding areas. Those staying at the property can also easily discover nearby attractions, such as Nyhavn, University of Copenhagen and Rundetaarn.Revato

name: Andersen Boutique Hotel
description: Set in the trendy Vesterbro district, this boutique hotel is just 200 m from Copenhagen Central Station. It offers modern, design rooms with LED TVs and free Wi-Fi. Andersen Boutique Hotel provides stylish rooms with décor by award-winning company Designers Guild. Each room has soundproofed windows, a shower and Molton Brown toiletries. All feature a minibar, desk and safe. Vesterbro is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping, food and museums.#The property will be going through renovation works from Sun 01 Jan 2017 until Fri 07 Apr 2017. During this period, guests may experience some noise or light disturbances, and some hotel facilities and services may not be available.Expedia

name: Cph Hotel
description: Next to the trendy Kødbyen district, CPH Hotel is less than 1 km from City Hall Square. All rooms have cable TV and free WiFi. The Scandinavian-style rooms at CPH Hotel have wooden floors and light, spacious bathrooms with hair dryers. Room furnishings include a work desk and an armchair. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the outdoor terrace during the summer months. Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station are a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is 20 minutes from the hotel by train.

name: Hotel Mayfair
description: Hotel Mayfair is located only 5 minutes from Copenhagen Central Station, so whether you take the train or taxi from the airport you are greeted at the reception 20 minutes later.Regardless of the room you book, itll meet your most important needs. Take off your shoes and relax on the bed, or connect to our Google Chromecast to stream your own content. Should you prefer a livelier setting, you can settle in our cozy lounge or sunny courtyard. At Hotel Mayfair we enjoy a good breakfast, thats why our new breakfast buffet is focused on organic, homemade & healthy products. You can expect creamy scrambled eggs, fresh juice, crispy bacon, high quality cold cuts and of course coffee. We also work with a local bakery, so we always have freshly baked sourdough bread ready for you in the morning.With our location at inner Vesterbro, youre a short walk from top restaurants, Tivoli and the popular Meatpacking district which is full of places to eat, art galleries and bars. We are always more than happy to help with recommendations and reservations.iHotelier/iStay

name: Woodah Hostel
address: 1 Abel Cathrines Gade, 1654 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Located in Copenhagen’s Vesterbro district, this hostel offers an in-house bar and café, as well as rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Copenhagen Central Station is 5 minutes’ walk away. Bed linen is included in all Woodah Hostel rooms. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guests can relax in the outdoor seating area. The bar serves chirashi sushi bowls, wine, beer, sake, Danish pastries as well as coffee and tea. A breakfast based on organic products is served every morning. Snacks, drinks and fruit can be bought in the café, and baggage storage is included. Several restaurants and shops are found in the surrounding area. Tivoli Amusement Park is a 7-minute walk from the hostel. The property offers a concierge for tailor made recommendations and help with reservations.

name: M18
description: Hotel M18 is set in Copenhagen, 1.9 km from Torvehallerne and 2.2 km from Rosenborg Castle, and offers accommodation with a shared lounge and kitchen. WiFi is free. In this partly self-serviced hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, TV and wardrobe. A private bathroom with a shower and hair dryer is also featured. Some rooms offer a seating area. The property is located 2.7 km from The David Collection and 2.8 km from The Hirschsprung Collection. The Round Tower is 2.9 km from M18 and the nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Studio1a Hotel Apartments
description: Summary: STUDIO 1A offers: → Brand new hotel apartments with hotel-like features, super fast WIFI, 24/7 keyless check-in, premium bedding & more. → A dedicated around the clock online reception to assist you prior to, during and after your stay. → Electronic smart locks on all doors enabling you to enjoy a hassle-free check-in and no need for key-sharing and/or waiting in queue for check-in. 100% secure, 100% hassle-free. → Perfect for nightly, weekly or monthly stays – we got you covered! → Nespresso coffee, tea & much more - feel at home! → Complimentary weekly mid-stay cleanings for stays above 7 nights To ensure you a pleasant, hassle-free stay, we are online 24/7 to assist you. We will be ready at your convenience to answer any questions. We would furthermore love to recommend top spots, what to see and do and where to find the best-hidden restaurant gems within Copenhagen. Our city is known as one of the leading gastro cities in the world - we hope you are ready to be amazed! Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out – we’re here to answer any questions you may have! The Space: Brand new studio apartment with kitchen, one double bed (160 cm) and a large separate bath with shower cabin. You’ll find a dining table, good lighting, curtains and all the amenities found in the profile such as washer/dryer (combined), hair dryer, fully equipped kitchen, coffee machine, iron etc. Please note that there are more than one apartment and that there might be minor deviations in lay out. All items (down to the number of knifes and forks), room sizes, amenities, quality level etc. is exactly the same but there are minor lay out differences. All apartments are located on the ground floor. Guest Access: Guests will have full access to the entire apartment with a private bathroom. Prior to your arrival you’ll receive a unique guest code for the smart lock installed. Hence you can expect a hassle-free and convenient check-in with the freedom to check in at exactly the time that suits you. The Neighborhood: STUDIO1A is located 4 km from the center of Copenhagen in the neighborhood “Østerbro”. Østerbro is characterized by broad boulevards, charming streets, great interior shops, green oases and Copenhagen's most famous statue – The Little Mermaid. The neighbourhood of Østerbro is somewhat posh and at the same time completely down to earth, as a lot of families with children live in this area because of the quietness, while still being a part of the city that has a lot of great things to offer. You can either walk, bike or take public transportation to central Copenhagen - a walk or a bikeride is definitely recommendable if the weather is good, as you can either walk along the lakes, pass by Nyboder or Kastellet, which are all must visit parts of Copenhagen. Getting Around: STUDIO1A is conveniently situated close to “Ryparken station” from where trains depart every 5 minutes, ensuring that you can quickly reach any part of Copenhagen or Denmark. Other Things to Note: As of October 2020 we have completed a two-year renovation turning our place into brand new hotel apartments. Our apartments are equipped with essential amenities; fast wireless internet included. We provide Nespresso coffee, tea, a dedicated 24/7 online reception, professional cleaning, 5-star hotel linnen & so much more. We will also assist you with local tips, top sights and all other questions you might have prior to your arrival. Our team will be online 24/7 to ensure a comfortable stay - please feel free to ask us about anything. We will be more than happy to help you to book e.g; → A table on the best restaurants in Copenhagen - one of the leading gastro-cities in the world! → Bicycles - A wonderful way to discover the city → Transfer from and to the airport → Baby crib and high-chair if you’re coming with a baby Interaction with Guests: We give you the independence that comes with an apartment and the comfort of staying at a hotel. To ensure you a pleasant, hassle-free vacation, we have a dedicated 24/7 online reception to assist you out prior to, during and after your stay. We offer hospitality of the highest standards and will be here day and night to assist you before, during and after your stay. We will be there to answer any questions about our hotel, the city or any other inquiries. Furthermore we would love to recommend to you the best-hidden restaurant gems within Copenhagen, one of the leading gastro cities in the world. We hope that you are ready to be amazed!VRBO

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Rosenborg Hotel Apartments
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Nobis Hotel Copenhagen
address: Niels Brocks Gade 1, 1574 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: No description found

name: Hotel 9 Små Hjem
description: Hotel 9 små hjem is located in Copenhagen, 1 km from Parken Stadium. Free WiFi is available. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find dry cleaning services at the property. Nyhavn is 1.9 km from Hotel 9 små hjem, while Christiania is 2.8 km from the property. Copenhagen Kastrup Airport is 8 km away.

name: Fairfield by Marriott Copenhagen Nordhavn
description: No description found

name: Go Hotel City Apartments
description: Situated 700 metres from Amager Strandpark, Go Hotel City Apartments features accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Kastrup Søbad Beach is 2.8 km from Go Hotel City Apartments, while Church of Our Saviour is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Dragor Hotel & Apartments
description: This waterfront hotel is in Dragør’s historic centre, 12 km from central Copenhagen. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking. All apartments have a 32-inch flat-screen TV and a shared terrace. Dishwashers, electric cookers and tea/coffee facilities are standard features at Dragør Apartments. All apartments have a private entrance, and some provide harbour views. The courtyard garden offers seating areas and BBQ equipment. A traditional Danish restaurant is also found on site. Plaice, pork and steak tartare are just some of its dishes. Copenhagen International Airport is just 6 km from Dragør Hotel & Apartments.

name: Daniel & Jacobs Boutique Apartments By the Beach Trail
description: Set within 600 metres of Amager Strandpark and 2.7 km of Kastrup Søbad Beach in Copenhagen, Jacob & Daniels Boutique Apartments offers accommodation with seating area. Complimentary WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy an à la carte or a vegetarian breakfast. Church of Our Saviour is 2.8 km from Jacob & Daniels Boutique Apartments, while Christiansborg Palace is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Carolinas Apartments Lbs 1 - 4
description: Set within 600 metres of The Round Tower and 600 metres of The National Museum of Denmark in the centre of Copenhagen, Carolinas Apartments LBS 1 - 4 offers accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Torvehallerne, Christiansborg Palace and Tivoli Gardens. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 7 km from Carolinas Apartments LBS 1 - 4.

name: Hotel d'Angleterre
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 92 guestrooms, featuring heated floors and LCD televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a 24-hour health club, an indoor pool, and a steam room. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Copenhagen? This hotel has facilities measuring 8159 square feet (758 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location D'Angleterre, Copenhagen is centrally located in Copenhagen, a 2-minute walk from Nyhavn and 9 minutes by foot from Rosenborg Castle. This 5-star hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Amalienborg Palace and 1 mi (1.6 km) from City Hall Square. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.
